    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ColorRow correctGuess
      It is the combination decided by the Maker
      private Player gameBreaker
      It is the player (computer or user) that tries to guess the combination
      private Game.GameInfo gameInfo
      It is a class that contains information about the game
      private Player gameMaker
      It is the player (computer or user) that choose the combination to guess
      private Game.Status gameStatus
      It is an Status, that is an enumeration that could be: START, GUESS, CORRECT, CHECK STATUS, SCORE, CORRECT or FINISHED
      private int gameTurn
      It is the number of turns the Breaker have used
      private java.util.ArrayList<ControlRow> mControl
      It is an ArrayList that contains all the control combinations given by the Maker
      private java.util.ArrayList<ColorRow> mGuess
      It is an ArrayList that contains all the combinations tried by the Breaker

      void prepareSave()
      Prepare save with the correct time spent in the game
      void provideHelp()
      Provides help to the user depending in the status; if the status is GUESS gives a combination to help to guess the correct combination and if the status is CONTROL gives the correct control answer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Player user1,
            Player user2,
            Game.GameInfo info)
        Instantiates a new Game. Depending the Role, set the player attributes Puts the game in stat START.
        Parameters:
        user1 - the user 1 is the user
        user2 - the user 2 is the computer
        info - is a class GameInfo and contains the user, the role, the number of pegs, the number of colors, the number of turns, the date and the time spent.
